name: Right-click and Save (An Anthology)
description: A copy artist's work in dedication to XCopy. As many, including Cozemo de' Medici have pointed out: Right-click & Save is one of the most important artworks of the modern era. I hope one day to walk into a museum in London with my daughter and point to it...knowing that I once examined every frame and every pixel in detail and failed to duplicate its magic.
